item.title: The Ultimate Guide To Life in Germany
item.dc:creator: Roman Freeman
item.description: Before I embraced the Wild Wild German countryside, I lived in the cloudiest, dirtiest, ugliest, most depressing, stinky, simply the best city in the world: Berlin.
